Attributes.description: Advanced study of conducting techniques and of representative major compositions and literature (later historical periods). Emphasis on knowledge and conducting skills that can communicate a thorough understanding of genre, idiom, form, texture, and style, in rehearsal and performance.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Restricted to M.Mus. Conducting (Choral, Orchestral, Wind) or permission of the instructor.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Thu, Start Time: 13:30, End Time: 15:30
